home.addToHomeScreen: Add this app to your home screen for faster access and improved experience.

project.importText: Import your projects and tasks from other services into Vikunja:

demo.title: This instance is in demo mode. Do not use this for real data!
demo.everythingWillBeDeleted: Everything will be deleted in regular intervals!
demo.accountWillBeDeleted: Your account will be deleted, including all projects, tasks and attachments you might create.

404.text: The page you requested does not exist.

ready.checkApiUrl: Please check if the api url is correct.
ready.noApiUrlConfigured: Nenhuma URL de API foi configurada. Por favor, defina uma abaixo:

offline.text: Please check your network connection and try again.

auth.usernameEmail: Nome de usuário ou endereço de e-mail
auth.resetPasswordAction: Send me a password reset link

auth.confirmEmailSuccess: You successfully confirmed your email! You can log in now.
auth.openIdStateError: State does not match, refusing to continue!
auth.openIdGeneralError: An error occured while authenticating against the third party.
auth.emailInvalid: Por favor, insira um endereço de e-mail válido.
auth.usernameRequired: Por favor, insira um nome de usuário.

settings.title: Settings
settings.passwordsDontMatch: The new password and its confirmation don't match.
settings.updateEmailSuccess: Your email address was successfully updated. We've sent you a link to confirm it.

general.title: General Settings
general.name: Name
general.emailReminders: Send me reminders for tasks via Email
general.overdueReminders: Send me a summary of my undone overdue tasks every day
general.discoverableByName: Allow other users to add me as a member to teams or projects when they search for my name
general.discoverableByEmail: Allow other users to add me as a member to teams or projects when they search for my full email
general.playSoundWhenDone: Play a sound when marking tasks as done
general.filterUsedOnOverview: Saved filter used on the overview page

totp.title: Two Factor Authentication
totp.finishSetupPart1: To finish your setup, use this secret in your totp app (Google Authenticator or similar):
totp.finishSetupPart2: After that, enter a code from your app below.
totp.scanQR: Alternatively you can scan this QR code:
totp.passcodePlaceholder: A code generated by your totp application
totp.setupSuccess: Você configurou a autenticação de dois fatores com sucesso!
totp.confirmSuccess: You've successfully confirmed your totp setup and can use it from now on!
totp.disableSuccess: A autenticação de dois fatores foi desativada com êxito.

caldav.title: CalDAV
caldav.howTo: Você pode conectar o Vikunja aos clientes de CalDAV para visualizar e gerenciar todas as tarefas de diferentes clientes. Digite esta url em seu cliente:
caldav.more: Mais informações sobre CalDAV em Vikunja
caldav.tokensHowTo: Você pode usar um token CalDAV em vez de uma senha para fazer o login no endpoint acima.
caldav.wontSeeItAgain: Anote isso, você não poderá vê-lo novamente.
caldav.mustUseToken: Você precisa criar um token CalDAV se quiser usar CalDAV com um cliente de terceiros. Use o token como a senha.

avatar.title: Avatar
avatar.setSuccess: The avatar has been set successfully!

appearance.title: Color Scheme
appearance.setSuccess: Saved change of color scheme to {colorScheme}

apiTokens.title: API Tokens
apiTokens.general: API tokens allow you to use Vikunja's API without user credentials.
apiTokens.permissionExplanation: Permissions allow you to scope what an api token is allowed to do.
apiTokens.tokenCreatedSuccess: Here is your new api token: {token}
apiTokens.tokenCreatedNotSeeAgain: Store it in a secure location, you won't see it again!

delete.text1: Are you sure you want to delete the token "{token}"?
delete.text2: This will revoke access to all applications or integrations using it. You cannot undo this.

attributes.title: Title
attributes.titlePlaceholder: Enter a title you will recognize later

deletion.title: Delete your Vikunja Account
deletion.text1: The deletion of your account is permanent and cannot be undone. We will delete all your projects, tasks and everything associated with it.
deletion.text2: To proceed, please enter your password. You will receive an email with further instructions.
deletion.text3: To proceed, please press the button below. You will receive an email with further instructions.
deletion.requestSuccess: The request was successful. You'll receive an email with further instructions.
deletion.confirmSuccess: You've successfully confirmed the deletion of your account. We will delete your account in three days.
deletion.scheduled: We will delete your Vikunja account at {date} ({dateSince}).
deletion.scheduledCancel: To cancel the deletion of your account, click here.
deletion.scheduledCancelText: To cancel the deletion of your account, please enter your password below:
deletion.scheduledCancelButton: To cancel the deletion of your account, please press the button below:
deletion.scheduledCancelConfirm: Cancel the deletion of my account
deletion.scheduledCancelSuccess: We will not delete your account.

export.title: Export your Vikunja data
export.description: You can request a copy of all your Vikunja data. This includes Projects, Tasks and everything associated to them. You can import this data in any Vikunja instance through the migration function.
export.descriptionPasswordRequired: Please enter your password to proceed:
export.request: Request a copy of my Vikunja Data
export.success: You've successfully requested your Vikunja Data! We will send you an email once it's ready to download.

links.title: Share Links
links.explanation: Share Links allow you to easily share a project with other users who don't have an account on Vikunja.
links.name: Name (optional)
links.nameExplanation: All actions done by this link share will show up with the name.
links.passwordExplanation: When signing in, the user will be required to enter this password.
links.removeText: Are you sure you want to remove this link share? It will no longer be possible to access this project with this link share. This cannot be undone!
links.createSuccess: The link share was successfully created.
links.deleteSuccess: The link share was successfully deleted

userTeam.removeText: Are you sure you want to remove this {sharable} from the {type}? This cannot be undone!
userTeam.removeSuccess: The {sharable} was successfully removed from the {type}.

gantt.showTasksWithoutDates: Show tasks which don't have dates set
gantt.noDates: This task has no dates set.

kanban.title: Kanban
kanban.doneBucketHint: All tasks moved into this bucket will automatically marked as done.
kanban.doneBucketHintExtended: All tasks moved into the done bucket will be marked as done automatically. All tasks marked as done from elsewhere will be moved as well.
kanban.doneBucketSavedSuccess: The done bucket has been saved successfully.
kanban.defaultBucketHint: When creating tasks without specifying a bucket, they will be added to this bucket.
kanban.defaultBucketSavedSuccess: The default bucket has been saved successfully.
kanban.deleteLast: You cannot remove the last bucket.
kanban.deleteBucketText1: Are you sure you want to delete this bucket?
kanban.deleteBucketText2: This will not delete any tasks but move them into the default bucket.
kanban.deleteBucketSuccess: The bucket has been deleted successfully.
kanban.bucketTitleSavedSuccess: The bucket title has been saved successfully.
kanban.bucketLimitSavedSuccess: The bucket limit been saved successfully.

webhooks.title: Webhooks
webhooks.eventsHint: Select all events this webhook should recieve updates for (within the current project).
webhooks.mustSelectEvents: You must select at least one event.
webhooks.deleteText: Are you sure you want to delete this webhook? External targets will not be notified of its events anymore.
webhooks.secretHint: If provided, all requests to the webhook target URL will be signed using HMAC.
webhooks.secretDocs: Check out the docs for more details about how to use secrets.

datemathHelp.canuse: Você pode usar matemática de data para filtrar datas relativas.
datemathHelp.title: Matemática de Data
datemathHelp.intro: Specify relative dates which are resolved on the fly by Vikunja when applying the filter.
datemathHelp.expression: Each Date Math expression starts with an anchor date, which can either be {0}, or a date string ending with {1}. This anchor date can optionally be followed by one or more maths expressions.
datemathHelp.similar: These expressions are similar to the ones provided by {0} and {1}.
datemathHelp.roundDay: Round down to the nearest day

examples.datePlusMonth: {0} mais um mês às 00:00 desse dia

quickAddMagic.hint: Use magic prefixes to define due dates, assignees and other task properties.
quickAddMagic.title: Quick Add Magic
quickAddMagic.intro: When creating a task, you can use special keywords to directly add attributes to the newly created task. This allows to add commonly used attributes to tasks much faster.
quickAddMagic.multiple: You can use this multiple times.
quickAddMagic.label1: To add a label, simply prefix the name of the label with {prefix}.
quickAddMagic.label2: Vikunja will first check if the label already exist and create it if not.
quickAddMagic.label3: To use spaces, simply add a " or ' around the label name.
quickAddMagic.priority1: Para definir a prioridade de uma tarefa, adicione um número de 1 a 5, precedido de um {prefix}.
quickAddMagic.priority2: Quanto maior o número, maior a prioridade.
quickAddMagic.assignees: To directly assign the task to a user, add their username prefixed with {prefix} to the task.
quickAddMagic.project1: To set a project for the task to appear in, enter its name prefixed with {prefix}.
quickAddMagic.project2: This will return an error if the project does not exist.
quickAddMagic.project3: To use spaces, simply add a " or ' around the project name.
quickAddMagic.date: Any date will be used as the due date of the new task. You can use dates in any of these formats:
quickAddMagic.dateWeekday: any weekday, will use the next date with that date
quickAddMagic.dateNth: will use the {day}th of the current month
quickAddMagic.dateTime: Combine any of the date formats with "{time}" (or {timePM}) to set a time.
quickAddMagic.repeatsDescription: To set a task as repeating in an interval, simply add '{suffix}' to the task text. The amount needs to be a number and can be omitted to use just the type (see examples).
